name: 3rd Avenue
description: '''3rd Avenue''', composed of Maurice "Moe-P" Pearl, Eric Jason Robinson, and Brad Nelson, were an American [[trio (music)|trio]] of [[contemporary R&B|R&B]] vocalists signed to [[SOLAR Records]] (Sound of Los Angeles Records), a [[Los Angeles]]-based label built from the existing roster of the former [[Soul Train Records]] founded by [[Don Cornelius]].
